0.title: Promos
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Walking Up to the Pretty Girl
1.plot: Jonathan, an aspiring writer, tries to come to grips with living in the shadow of his girlfriend, Susan Sarandon. Interior designer Nina struggles to get pregnant. And Derek focuses exclusively on his comedy career, to the detriment of his love life.

2.title: Shooting Daggers
2.plot: Lori, a self-made businesswoman, has found the man of her dreams, but he has four teenage kids. Derek catches a big career break. And radio personality Rosie sees her world get turned upside down in a moment.

3.title: In a Split Second
3.plot: Married couple Eli and Ido are raising two children while struggling to overcome a personal tragedy. Jonathan learns that his father is having health problems. And Rosie tries to move forward, only to face another life-altering challenge.

4.title: Pick Your Battles
4.plot: Newly pregnant Nina and Stefano deal with their life change in different ways. Derek moves out of his mom's house and takes advantage of being single. And Lori reflects on her childhood while debating having kids of her own.

5.title: Divorce Is the Chanel
5.plot: Lori's parenting comes into question during her and Jan's weekend in Connecticut with the kids. After nine years of marriage and seven years apart, Jonathan's wife comes to New York to get a divorce. Rosie drops a bombshell about her wedding day as she examines her past marriage and relationship.

6.title: Spinning Life's Curveballs
6.plot: Jonathan sends his novel out for reviews and awaits his fate. Eli and Ido give role reversals a try at home so Eli can balance his new work schedule and responsibilities. Rosie watches her boyfriend Josh's career soar while struggling to make her own dreams come true.

7.title: Tearing Down Walls
7.plot: As the holidays and nuptials approach, the pace picks up on Lori's wedding planning. Eli confronts Ido about finding closure for their loss while they struggle to move forward and allow for celebration. Tensions arise between Nina and Stefano as they begin renovations on their apartment and must move in with her in-laws, all the while planning their long-awaited baby shower, where Nina and Stefano's mothers meet for the first time.

8.title: It Must Be Thanksgiving
8.plot: Derek spends Thanksgiving with the three most important women in his life. While spending the holiday with cousins, Eli and Ido wonder if their daughter needs a mother figure. Lori remembers the lonely holidays of her youth as she prepares to host her first Thanksgiving with her new family. Nina and Stefano struggle with the inevitable life changes their imminent parenthood will bring.

9.title: Clashing Baggage
9.plot: Jonathan and Susan's relationship reaches a breaking point. Nina exhibits her professional strengths when she and Stefano decide to remodel. And Derek withstands criticism as he struggles to communicate his outlook on relationships and romance.

10.title: Family Is Who You Make It
10.plot: As she gears up for both the holidays and her wedding, Lori is faced with a special surprise from her past. While accompanying Josh to his hair transplant procedure, Rosie receives a life-changing proposal. And Derek weighs the influence of his parents' divorce on his own lifestyle.

11.title: Birth Plan
11.plot: Nina and Stefano review their birth plan just in time for their baby's arrival. Jonathan attempts to make the most of his newfound freedom while out on his first date in years. And Derek watches his hard work pay off as his first TV series premieres.

12.title: Ready for the Adventure
12.plot: Nina struggles with the challenges and pressures of motherhood as she and Stefano take baby home. Eli and Ido await a decision that will define the rest of their lives. And Jonathan travels to LA for business as he lays the groundwork for his new venture, only to get caught up in an unexpected detour.

13.title: Marriage & Other Arrangements
13.plot: Lori and Jan's wedding day arrives. On a New Year's trip, Jonathan reconnects with Susan. And Rosie's parents make an effort to accept her boyfriend as part of the family.

14.title: The Journey
14.plot: As Lori continues to explore the possibility of having a child, she confronts the realities of work pressure and her ticking biological clock. Nina must find a way to balance her own career with childcare responsibilities. And Eli and Ido reconnect with important past relationships as they consider expanding their family.

15.title: Sex, Lies & Valentine's
15.plot: Derek heads to Los Angeles for work while staying on his quest for romantic companionship free of any entanglements. Rosie and her boyfriend take another step toward being grown-ups. And, while celebrating their first Valentine's Day as parents, Nina and Stefano are already reminiscing about how things used to be.

16.title: Rocking the Boat
16.plot: Lori and Jan struggle with how to tell the kids that they are considering having a child of their own together. After Eli and Ido consult with their doctor, they must speak with one more important player before they can put another baby journey in motion. And when Rosie's dad tells her about a house for sale in her parents' neighborhood, Rosie feels pressured to make a decision about her marital future.

17.title: One Hell of a Ride
17.plot: Nina travels to Miami to visit Stefano's family while trying to solidify her relationship with them. Jonathan continues to challenge his understanding of traditional relationships as he finds himself on an impromptu vacation with a married woman. And Eli and Ido break out of their everyday domestic routine with a winter getaway in Mexico.

18.title: Love & Restrictions
18.plot: After visiting his mother and reflecting on his parents' relationship, Jonathan fears that he is becoming too much like his father. Meanwhile, Derek finds respite from the strange Los Angeles atmosphere by spending time with his absent father. And Lori comes face to face with her own traumatic family history when her long lost sister comes to town.

19.title: Heading Home
19.plot: Lori continues to vie for the kids' acceptance while she and Jan begin their search for a new family home in Westport. In the weeks leading up to Ido's U.S. citizenship test, contentions rise when his mother visits and expresses her frustration with the distance between New York and Israel. And Derek reaches for Hollywood greatness, only to be reminded of what - or who - is truly important.

20.title: Love Around the Corner
20.plot: Rosie considers her priorities before joining Josh on a tropical island getaway. Lori remains realistic about her fertility journey and focuses on making a new home with Jan and the kids. Eli and Ido celebrate a life-defining achievement. And Derek finally returns to his mother, to stand-up and to New York City - the city of dreams.
